solution_line_template: By adding Friday and Saturday, Alexandra bought {saturday_magazines}+{friday_magazines}=<<{saturday_magazines}+{friday_magazines}={total_fri_sat}>>{total_fri_sat} magazines

Before her dog got to them she had {saturday_magazines}+{friday_magazines}+{sunday_magazines}=<<{saturday_magazines}+{friday_magazines}+{sunday_magazines}={total_before_dog}>>{total_before_dog} magazines
After her dog chewed up some she had {total_before_dog}-{dog_chewed}=<<{total_before_dog}-{dog_chewed}={total_after_dog}>>{total_after_dog} magazines
